location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns an offer that William Bruce has accepted for some of the remaining goods stored at the warehouse. In addition, he has shipped off the remaining wool to Bussora [Basra] due to fears that they are no longer safe at Bushire via the bugula [buggalow] Haushamie.
